name: Laguna Woods
shortDescription: A tranquil, primarily 55+ community known for its amenities, parks, and convenient access to coastal OC.
fullDescription: Laguna Woods is a peaceful city in Orange County best known for Laguna Woods Village, a large 55+ community offering extensive amenities including golf courses, clubhouses, pools, and social clubs. With nearby shopping centers, medical facilities, and easy access to beaches and trails, Laguna Woods provides a relaxed lifestyle with strong community engagement and ample recreational opportunities.
heroImageAlt: Sunny walking path lined with trees in a suburban community

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Hills
neighborhoods.description: Family-friendly suburban city with parks, shopping, and convenient access across OC.

neighborhoods.name: Aliso Viejo
neighborhoods.description: Planned community with parks, shopping centers, and family amenities.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Park and homes in Aliso Viejo

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Beach
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city known for beaches, art galleries, and scenic coves.

neighborhoods.name: Lake Forest
neighborhoods.description: Suburban city with well-kept parks, lakes, and community facilities.

highlights.title: Laguna Woods Village Amenities
highlights.description: Golf courses, clubhouses, pools, fitness centers, and hundreds of social clubs.

highlights.title: Parks & Greenbelts
highlights.description: Shaded walking paths, neighborhood parks, and nearby regional trail access.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Tree-lined walking path in a park

highlights.title: Proximity to Beaches
highlights.description: Quick drive to Laguna Beach and Dana Point for coastal walks and ocean views.

highlights.title: Nearby Shopping & Healthcare
highlights.description: Close to shopping centers, markets, and medical facilities for everyday convenience.

faqs.question: What is Laguna Woods known for?
faqs.answer: Laguna Woods is known for Laguna Woods Village, a premier 55+ community with resort-style amenities and active social life.

faqs.question: How is the real estate market in Laguna Woods?
faqs.answer: The market features primarily condos and co-ops, offering comparatively affordable options within Orange County.

faqs.question: What recreational options are nearby?
faqs.answer: Residents enjoy on-site amenities plus quick access to regional parks, hiking trails, and coastal beaches.

faqs.question: How convenient is commuting from Laguna Woods?
faqs.answer: Located near I-5 and SR-73, with nearby transit options connecting to surrounding OC cities.
